sentences: Loen siin su tarka keeldu, et rahvas heidetega ei rüvetaks leeri.
Tugeva heitega viskas kalamees õnge vette.
Heidete hulka kuuluvad kuulitõuge, kettaheide, vasaraheide ja odavise.
context: The word 'loen' is the first-person singular present tense form of the Estonian verb 'lugema', which means 'to read'. It indicates that someone (the speaker) is currently reading something. In the given sentence, it translates to 'I read here your wise prohibition...'
